Crime_Name: Judicial Review of Humanitarian and Compassionate (H&C) Decision
Legal_Issue: Reasonableness of H&C decision, Procedural fairness
Evidence_Type: Evidence of violence, psychological impact, state protection in Mexico, public documents
Key_Factor_in_Determination: Officer's consideration of risks in Mexico, adequacy of reasons, use of public documents
Legal_Standard: Unreasonableness or breach of procedural fairness required for intervention
Decision_Review_Issue: Was the refusal reasonable and procedurally fair?
Outcome_of_Review: No certified question, no cost order
Cause_of_Refusal: Applicant did not demonstrate sufficient hardship or failure to meet H&C threshold
Evidentiary_Issues: Use of public documents without prior disclosure â€“ found acceptable
Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge based on alleged unreasonableness and procedural unfairness
Procedural_Issue: Disclosure of public documents before decision
